A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After The Force Awakens was a bland rehash of the original 1977 Star Wars\, I thought the franchise under Disney's control couldn't get any worse. I was wrong. \n\nThis movie is stupid garbage that features blatant political grandstanding\, character arcs that go nowhere\, space battles that make no sense\, and a complete disregard for the established universe.
